# Education Coordinator – Lower Fraser River Area, BC (Canada)

### Tender Information

*   *Reference Number:* cb-7747-5298379
*   *Amendment Number* : 1
*   *Solicitation Number:* 30004527
*   *Publication Date:* July 31, 2023
*   *Tender Closing Date:* August 21, 2023 14:00:00
*   *Amendment Date:* August 21, 2023
*   *Expected Contract Start Date:* September 1, 2023
*   *Expected Contract End Date:* March 31, 2026

### Tender Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking Contractors to provide educational and community outreach services for the Stream to Sea program in the Lower Fraser River (LFR) area of British Columbia. The successful Contractor will be responsible for:

*   *Coordinating and delivering educational programs and teaching resources to support student learning and teacher development*;
*   *Providing logistics and administrative support for Stream to Sea activities in the LFR area, as defined in the Scope of Work (Appendix 1)*; and
*   *Collaborating with Stakeholders and Community Groups to develop and implement educational programs and outreach activities*

### Key Responsibilities

The Contractor will be expected to:

*   *Work with the Community Advisor (CA) to develop and implement a work plan for the LFR area, aligned with the geographic area*
*   *Coordinate and deliver educational programs, teaching resources, and outreach activities, in collaboration with the CA and other stakeholders*
*   *Provide logistical and administrative support for Stream to Sea activities, including coordinating egg deliveries, maintaining records, and purchasing equipment*

### Education Coordinator Job Requirements

To apply, applicants should have:

*   A *Bachelor's degree in Education or a related field*
*   *Proven experience in educational program coordination and delivery*
*   *Strong relationship-building and communication skills*
*   *Ability to work independently and as part of a team*

### How to Apply

*   Interested Contractors should submit a Proposal outlining their understanding of the project requirements, their methodology for delivering the services, and their experience in similar projects.
*   Proposal should be submitted by the Tender Closing Date and Time.

### Contact Information
